body:
> Just to ensure we don't start heading 6 directions at once, I am
> continuing discussions with Peter and LBL regarding transfer of the
> radiance-online.org domain to an LBL server.


Apologies for getting ahead of myself. The last messages on the subject
did not give the impression that something was definitely going to happen,
so I figured it would be easier finding a new host for radiance-online
MINUS most of the large, chunky bits.


Now I understand that help is not required.


Axel
___
